name: CHAOTIC ERA
description:
BOBBY TECHNOLOGY INC. is a Toronto-based indie game development studio founded in 2019 by Gabriel O’Flaherty-Chan and Kevin Donnelly. The two first met while working on the experimental products team at Shopify. 

www.bobbybobbybobby.com
